title: List of schools in Kabul
text: The following is a list of schools in the <a href="Afghanistan">Afghan</a> capital, <a href="Kabul">Kabul</a>. It includes <a href="elementary%20school">elementary</a> and <a href="high%20school">high school</a>s. Some are schools for boys only while others are strictly for girls. All <a href="List%20of%20schools%20in%20Afghanistan">schools in Afghanistan</a> are run by the <a href="Ministry%20of%20Education%20%28Afghanistan%29">Ministry of Education</a> and free to the public although some private ones may charge fees.
